channel.title: My Website
channel.description: Ok.... I'm creating a website (it will have a forum on it) thats sort of like a myspace (not as gay) and i was wondering if I should use IPB or SMF.... Could I please have some input on what I should use?

item.title: My Website
item.dc:creator: @I_Really_Did_Lol I Really Did Lol
item.description:
@I_Really_Did_Lol wrote:

IPB if you have no idea about Mysql and shit. IPB is easy to use and has nice looks. Overall, SMF is the best but hard.

Read full topic
